Class HvacClient

java.lang.Object
com.gree.hvac.client.HvacClient
public class HvacClient extends Object
GREE HVAC device client for controlling air conditioning units

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Create HVAC client with all dependencies for testing
    HvacClient(String host)
    Create HVAC client with host address
